text:
Two dark, anonymous skyscrapers stretch across the night sky, towering even above the pale moon hanging in the center. Cramped between these architectural giants, the viewer feels small, craning their neck skyward to take in the enormity of these simple shapes.
These buildings, as symbols of modern progress, represent the rapid expansion of industrial city space. Yet, the moon glowing brightly between the walls of the sky, offers a stunning natural contrast to the harsh, tight lines these structures.
title: City Night
